INVALID_COMMAND_TEXT: I am sorry, I did not understand that statement. Please check the docs to learn about my features
INVALID_ORDER_TEXT: is not a valid Little Delhi item! Use: 'alfred list' to see the list of valid items
NO_NAME_TEXT: you have not registered your name yet! Use: alfred name "<FIRST> <LAST>", to set your name
INVALID_NAME_TEXT: is an invalid name. Your command must be formatted as such: alfred name "<FIRST> <LAST>"
